note: #ScienceFiction Writer & #IrishStudies academic. Research Fellow at Aberystwyth Uni. Author of Neil Jordan: Works for the Page (Cork UP, 2022) and (with Tiffani Angus) Spec Fic for Newbies (Luna Press, 2023). Also author of articles in Irish University Review, Science Fiction Studies, Irish Studies Review, & Journal of Graphic Novels and Comics. Stories in Year's Best Science Fiction, Best of British Science Fiction, Interzone, Unidentified Funny Objects, Nature Futures, & more. He/him.
